experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Juniper Networks
workDescription: Created an UI based SaaS tool for the product offerings of Juniper for consumers by integrating 4 internal CLI tools which led to reduction in testing time by 40%.
Integrated Mist AI API endpoints with SaaS tool to automate event correlation, root cause identification and anomaly detection.
Used python as a scripting language to setup automations to provision Linux VM instances, collect telemetry data and write to an influx time-series database.
Wrote reusable unit test documents to ensure quality control and detect bugs by over 35% efficiency rate and automated the bringing up of server instances in the event of failures.

experiences.title: Product Engineer
experiences.subtitle: INSZoom.Inc
workDescription: Analyzed requirements and designed software solution specifications for development requirements.
Isolated, recreated and provided fixes for the bugs reported at the production environment.

experiences.title: Assistant Software Engineer

workDescription: Participated in requirement gathering from client and update the existing modules based on client request.
